metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13712 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in the id3v2AddAudioDuration function inlibmp3lame/id3tag.c in LAME 3.99.5 allows attackers to perform Denial ofService by triggering a NULL first argument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13712` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
